ygData.subject: Re: Missing Songs!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... An aside - something we ve discussed before about invis to undead and unrest. Not playing a bard on Lanys - but a wizard - wizards only get regular invis.
ygData.messageBody:
At 09:36 AM 2/15/00 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Papa Legba <legba@...>
>
>>
>> Level 39: Invis to Undead (useful in Lower guk etc)
>> Level 45: An upgraded Bellow/DD song (giving us better combat skills)
>
>These two I like.

An aside - something we've discussed before about invis to undead and unrest.

Not playing a bard on Lanys - but a wizard - wizards only get regular invis.

There has been some debate about unrest undead in the past - sometimes the
bard song works - sometimes it don't.

Was in unrest last night with a 36th level wizard. Now - you'd think
regular invis wouldn't be just a heck of a lot of good in there - but I've
gotten in the habit of casting it so I can med pretty much unmolested by
yard trash.

Now - here is the interesting part (least to me). Someone shouts train -
and it's a doozy - from deep in the basement. Out spill numerous assorted
undead, bats, terrors, hags, etc. By 36 - a lot of this stuff was green,
the remaining was blue - and I was still regular invis'd.

I was actually conning them to see if anything there would still give me
any xp - but what I started noticing - once undead in Unrest get below a
certain stage of green - regular invis seems to work on them as well.

I have no idea if this is 'normal' for undead but I don't remember ever
seeing it before. I also don't know if they've changed something because
one hag saw me - one didn't (and yes, I know hags aren't undead) - first
time I've ever conned a hag invisible and she conned that she saw me.

Anyone got any ideas?
